parameters: Frooty Loopys are legit. Not only are they high in THC, but it's packed
with a little extra stuff that will open your mind and help you see things
you couldn't normally see without drugs.
Eat this whenever you see foot steps on the ground. You get so messed up
that you'll see a door open up and take you to a secret room.
You never run out of Frooty Loopys, but it will cost you 6 Mojo points
You want to buy a bowl?
